file(COPY  issue61.cir issue61.cir.sh tags DESTINATION ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR})
file(CHMOD ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/issue61.cir.sh PERMISSIONS OWNER_READ OWNER_WRITE OWNER_EXECUTE GROUP_READ GROUP_EXECUTE WORLD_READ WORLD_EXECUTE)
if( (NOT Xyce_PARALLEL_MPI) AND PERL_FOUND )
  add_test(NAME ${TestNamePrefix}Certification_Tests/ISSUE_61/issue61.cir.sh COMMAND perl -I${XyceRegressionTestScripts} issue61.cir.sh $<TARGET_FILE:Xyce> ${XYCE_VERIFY} ${XYCE_VERIFY} issue61.cir ${OutputDataDir}/Certification_Tests/ISSUE_61/issue61.cir.prn )
  set_property(TEST ${TestNamePrefix}Certification_Tests/ISSUE_61/issue61.cir.sh PROPERTY LABELS "serial;nightly;issue61;errorexit;bsrc;expression")
